text: The IRT Broadway - Seventh Avenue Line is one of the lines of the New York City Subway. There are three services on the line, colored tomato red and numbered 1, 2 and 3. ==Services== * 1: This is a local service from 242nd Street to South Ferry. * 2: This is an express service from 241st Street to Flatbush Avenue (limited to New Lots Avenue during rush hours). * 3: This is an express service from 148th Street to New Lots Avenue (limited to 42nd Street / Times Square during late nights).
